description:
---

### [choco://irfanview-languages](choco://irfanview-languages)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

### Available languages:

* English (always included)
* Arabic
* Bulgarian
* Catalan
* Chinese
* Czech/Cesky
* Dansk
* Deutsch/German (schon integriert, hier die deutsche Hilfe-Datei)
* Estonian
* Finnish
* French
* Hebrew
* Hungarian (help file included)
* Italian
* Japanese (help file included)
* Korean
* Latvian
* Lithuanian
* Nederlands
* Norwegian/Norsk
* Polski (help file included)
* Portugues-Brasil (help file included)
* Portuguese
* Romanian
* Russian (help file included) (also contains translated PlugIns)
* Slovak
* Slovenscina
* Spanish
* Svenska/Swedish
* Turkish
* Ukrainian
* Uzbek

(Some are updated for this version, some are mostly compatible.)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/irfanview-languages/readme.md)**


---

author: Irfan Skiljan
